testId.name: Exception - Multiple Base Instances not disjoint

tests.requirements:
Requirement II. 10 Each of the bulk inventory mechanisms listed in Requirement II 9 shall support the ability to provide a subset of the inventory known to the target OS. The subset is defined by a filter provided by the requesting OS. The following filter shall be supported:
f. The subtrees should be disjoint.

request.bodyParameters:
Filter.baseInstanceList = { (MD=md1, ME=me1, EH=eh1), (MD=md1, ME=me1)}
Filter.includedObjectTypes = { (ME, ATTRS) }
DiffDateAndTime = NULL

postconditions.success: The requesting OS has all the requested inventory information from the target OS.
postconditions.failure: The requesting OS does not have the entire requested inventory information from the target OS.
